Title: Outer Pier
Description: Gulls scream over tarred ropes and creaking timbers. Dockhands curse while a stone construct hoists a crate.
Paragraphs: A bored quartermaster shrugs: 'Tutorial kits on the barrel. Take what you need. Press [I] in-game to open your inventory.'

Options.Label: Pick up dockside supplies (potions and bread)
Take a cloth cap and auto-equip it

Exits.Text: Cross to the Main Gate Bridge (city entrance)
